languages.text: The target of Kick must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|8c9f4b237a774e008c21e126a8b98746} penalty or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Targets of Kick must pass a Toughness test with a −(2 × Veteran's STR bonus) penalty, or become prone for 1 round.
Targets of Kick must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −(2 × Veteran's STR bonus) penalty or fall prone for 1 round.

languages.text: 被疾速猛踢击中的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|8c9f4b237a774e008c21e126a8b98746}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的敌人会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 被疾速猛踢击中的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于（2×老兵的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}）。未能通过检定的敌人会进入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
